en.title: WELCOME TO MY PORTFOLIO
content: üßëüèª‚Äçüíª Hi there! I'm David Sim√≥n, a passionate Full Stack Web Developer with over 2 years of experience in the exciting world of programming.

üöÄ Throughout my brief journey, I've gained extensive knowledge in web application development and I'm always seeking new ways to breathe life into creative and innovative ideas. Programming has become my second language, and I enjoy facing daily challenges that allow me to grow professionally and push my limits.

üöß Although my portfolio is still in development, mainly due to my focus on professional projects, these experiences have allowed me to face significant challenges and learn from real-world situations.

/projects.name: My daily Job
/projects.description: Here, I dedicate almost 100% of my time to programming, focusing specifically on web projects related to KYC (Know Your Customer) requirements within the financial sector. While I can't share specific details due to confidentiality agreements with the company, I can mention that my involvement covers a wide range of products developed using various technologies. I've worked on both the frontend and backend, participating in Rest API development, process automation, advanced reporting creation, and the implementation of agile methodologies, among other aspects.

/projects.name: ddabetic
/projects.description: Small project that still under development and I started during a summer vacation using Laravel and Vue 3. This web application aimed to manage and improve diabetes control.

/projects.name: MyPortfolio
/projects.description: I wanted to embark on a personal project during my free time, disconnecting from the professional and work environment to explore my creativity without restrictions. I started experimenting with the Nuxt framework, and that's how I created the portfolio you are currently viewing.
React, maybe? With Astro? Who knows...

/jobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer at Simple KYC
/jobs.details: This is my current job where I have learned a wide range of web development skills and technologies.

/jobs.title: Dominama An√°lisis Tecnol√≥gicos S.L.
/jobs.details: My first contact with the working world, here I completed the 3-month internship required by the superior degree. Unfortunately, due to the COVID-19 pandemic, these internships had to be done 100% remotely.

/studies.title: Superior Degree in Multi-Platform Applications Development
/studies.details: Here I began my programming studies: Java, Python, SQL, Linux... a world of learning and growth with dedicated teachers and colleagues. These years undoubtedly marked an unforgettable time in my educational journey.

/studies.title: Technological Bachillerato
/studies.details: In Spain, we have what is referred to as Bachillerato, an educational phase following secondary school that acts as a transition to higher education. This stage prepares students for university studies and vocational avenues alike. Personally, I specialized in the science track, which primarily focuses on subjects like mathematics, chemistry, biology, and more.

/others.title: English Empire College
/others.details: As part of my professional development, the company I work for paid us English classes focused on improving our English language skills.

/others.title: Driving lessons
/others.details: I completed driving lessons and obtained my class B driver's license

/others.title: Lingua Generation
/others.details: An English academy with native teachers
